name: Citizens of Thronehold
description: The lawful citizens of the human capital city of Thronehold.

name: Thronehold City Guard
description: The city guard of Thronehold, protectors of law and order.

name: Citizens of Silverweave
description: The graceful elves of the treetop city of Silverweave.

name: Silverweave Wardens
description: Elven rangers who protect the city from above.

name: Citizens of Ironhold
description: The stout dwarves of the mountain fortress city.

name: Ironhold Sentinels
description: Dwarven warriors who guard the city gates.

name: Citizens of Bloodmire
description: The fierce orcs of the swamp city of Bloodmire.

name: Citizens of Shadowgrave
description: The dark denizens of the underground necropolis.

name: Freeport Watch
description: The neutral city guard of Freeport, a haven for all.

name: Bloodmire Legion
description: The organized orc army of Bloodmire.

name: Shadowfang Clans
description: Wild orc tribes of the Shadowfang territories.

name: Crimson Marauders
description: Ruthless orc raiders of the Crimson Wastes.

name: Gloomfang Tribes
description: Chaotic goblin tribes of the Gloomfang Caves.
